primary

Class Capture

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • primary.Capture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Capture
extends java.lang.Thread
    Capture class that captures a styrofoam block once the detect object has detected such a block.
    Author:
    Erik-Olivier Riendeau, 2016
